solution_line_template: Of all the scientists taking part in the project, half of them are from Europe, which means {total_scientists} * {europe_fraction} = <<{total_scientists}*{europe_fraction}={europe_scientists}>>{europe_scientists} people.
The number of researchers from Canada is {total_scientists} * {canada_fraction} = <<{total_scientists}*{canada_fraction}={canada_scientists}>>{canada_scientists} people.

That means there are {total_scientists} - {europe_scientists} - {canada_scientists} = <<{total_scientists}-{europe_scientists}-{canada_scientists}={usa_scientists}>>{usa_scientists} researchers from the USA.
